Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mtDNA mutations accumulation and oxidative stress causing mitochondrial dysfunction and aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS production causing oxidative damage to mitochondrial components including mtDNA, leading to dysfunction and apoptosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial oxidative damage and mtDNA deletions in skin aging, linking oxidative stress to mitochondrial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details mtDNA mutations and ROS vicious cycle causing mitochondrial dysfunction and muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on accumulation of mtDNA deletions from reactive oxygen metabolites causing bioenergetic deficiency and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on mtDNA as primary aging damage site from free radicals, linking mtDNA injury to mitochondrial loss and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ROS generation causing oxidative damage and mutations in mtDNA, leading to mitochondrial dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights age-dependent oxidative damage accumulation in mtDNA impairing respiratory complexes and mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on somatic mtDNA mutations accumulation causing respiratory chain decline and systemic aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes accumulation of oxidative mtDNA lesions like 8-oxo-dG and changes in mtDNA repair capacity with aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ROS damage causing mtDNA mutations accumulation, mitochondrial dysfunction, and aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial SOD2 antioxidant role in preventing oxidative damage accumulation and mitochondrial dysfunction with aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details oxidative damage accumulation to mitochondrial ETC proteins causing dysfunction and progressive aging decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes complex II mutation causing increased ROS, oxidative stress, and accelerated aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS production triggering apoptosis and aging via mitochondrial electron transport chain components.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights complex I dysfunction increasing mtROS and oxidative damage, with lifespan extension by bypassing complex I.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS activating p38 MAPK stress response via Trx-ASK1 complex regulation contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on complex I activity modulating mitochondrial homeostasis, mitohormesis, and apoptosis pathways affecting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes ROS as primary cause of aging via oxidative damage, with lifespan extension linked to reduced electron transport and ROS.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Apoptosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitohormesis where mitochondrial ROS act as adaptive signals promoting longevity via stress responses and chaperonins.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial respiratory chain defects modulating lifespan via distinct molecular pathways and metabolic restructuring.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes progressive ETC dysfunction causing decreased ATP, increased ROS, and systemic aging, linking mitochondrial defects to lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes intrinsic mitochondrial impairment and decline in mitochondrial content/function as drivers of aging and lifespan regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details age-related decline in mitochondrial content, altered dynamics, and discoordination of mitochondrial gene expression affecting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows mitochondrial respiratory chain impairment can extend lifespan via reduced ROS and genetic interactions modulating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ATP synthase c-subunit isoform expression modulating mitochondrial bioenergetics and organismal longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial functional decline and TCA cycle metabolic imbalance driving aging phenotypes and lifespan modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Lifespan Modulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Extends mitochondrial dysfunction hypothesis to metabolic syndrome and atherosclerosis linking mitochondrial energy decline to systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dynamics and Quality Control Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial fusion/fission balance, mitophagy, and biogenesis decline causing mitochondrial dysfunction and aging.
